name: Cococart
headline: Empowering local businesses to sell online.
description: Cococart is the easiest way for anyone to sell anything online. Merchants can set up a store with no code, no design, and no app downloads. 200 million businesses worldwide still use WhatsApp or phone to take orders — but with Cococart, they can set up a website with no learning curve.

founders.name: Derek Low, Founder
founders.description:
Derek is the CEO & founder of Cococart.

He founded Basecamp Bali, an award-winning hotel in Indonesia, which he ran as CEO from 2019-2021. The hotel achieved a 100% occupancy rate with perfect ratings on Booking.com and Airbnb.

He also created the Berkeley Ridiculously Automated Dorm with over 2 million views on YouTube. It has been featured in TIME, Forbes, CNN, BBC, Ellen TV, and hundreds of other media sources.

Derek graduated from UC Berkeley in Electrical Engineering & Computer Sciences.

# The easiest way to run your business
### Manage your orders, payments, marketing & more — in one place
[Try Cococart in 1 minute](https://www.cococart.co/<https:/get.cococart.co/>)
## Take online orders.Accept reservations.Send promotions.And so much more.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6509b06e3d953ba6e24b5017_preview3-2.png)
Featured in
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6491edfbb99e4b847ee945d2_yahoo-finance-logo%402x.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/64f0c2ebdd01a5c85590cab7_techinasia-bw.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6491edfb3df6966fa0b80ca3_fortune-logo%402x.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/64f0c1b46e426b98240ecb4c_techcrunch-bw.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/60f98240994bfcc022c6b611_yc.png)
## Cococart is made for local businesses.
We're on a mission to transform independent businesses to accept online orders. Cococart empowers small businesses to manage their own sales without apps or marketplaces that charge unsustainable fees and commissions.
### All-in-one platform. Easy to set up and use.
![List of orders with details of the customer, items, and payment](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6509d95f8abe80fcffec9c8d_pos_ipad_spacegrey_landscape-resized.png)
Free POS system for your retail & online orders
Take reservations and appointments
![UI asking the customer to pick a date and time for their reservation](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6499dedf3962f3dd0497838a_bookings_v4.webp)
Send marketing emails
![Options to send marketing emails to all customers or specific subsets of them](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6499dedf3fadf2b4d1ea81ba_marketingemails_v2.webp)
Create a loyalty program
![Loyalty program reward and redeemed coupon code](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6499deded5014d2289bc7339_loyalty_v2.webp)
Automatically collect all kinds of payments
![List of orders with details of the customer, items, and payment](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6509e8ae6e7f9dcddbff4893_payments-2-resized.png)
## Sell (almost) anything you can think of...
![Example store of a restaurant](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6499e58edec80530a208f938_restaurants-example.webp)
![Example store of a physical good store](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6509d9e8020d89403630fd12_physical-goods-p-1080.webp)
![Example online store of a salon or spa](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6499e484dec80530a207a8b5_salon-store.webp)
![Example online store of a service business](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/60f35132d5febb6f03ec9d7a/6499e4855e43cb8f14c09fc9_service-store.webp)

### Affordable pricing for businesses of any size
### No sales calls. No contracts. Get started today.
## Personal
For online sellers
$9/mo
[Sign Up Now](https://www.cococart.co/<https:/get.cococart.co/>)
## Growth
For growing businesses
$29/mo
BEST VALUE
[Sign Up Now](https://www.cococart.co/<https:/get.cococart.co/>)
## Pro
For high-performing businesses
$79/mo
[Sign Up Now](https://www.cococart.co/<https:/get.cococart.co/>)
BEST FEATURES
Free trial for 14 days. Cancel anytime.
See our [pricing plans](https://www.cococart.co/<https:/www.cococart.co/pricing>)
## Questions? Answers.
#### **Who is Cococart for?**
keyboard_arrow_down
Any local business can start using Cococart. From home bakers and crafters, to restaurants and cafés, we're building an all-in-one platform to help you streamline sales, marketing, operations—without needing to spend thousands in fees a month.
#### **What does it cost?**
keyboard_arrow_down
You can try all of Cococart for free for 14 days, and then choose a plan that suits your needs starting at just $9.
#### **Can I get a free trial?**
keyboard_arrow_down
Yes, you can start using the best of Cococart for free. The free trial of Cococart already gives you more features than any other business platform, and when you're ready, you can choose a premium plan.
#### **Where do my orders go?**
keyboard_arrow_down
We've built an order management system for you. Simply log in to your admin dashboard and you'll be able to manage your orders, see your earnings, add products, and more!
#### **How do I collect payments?**
keyboard_arrow_down
You can fully customize how you wish to be paid. We support all payment methods from credit cards to bank transfer, Venmo to Zelle, PayNow to GCash.
#### **What fees are there?**
keyboard_arrow_down
For payments direct to your account, there are no fees.For credit/debit card payments, we use Stripe.com which charges a standard 1 - 4% depending on country.
#### **What countries do you support?**
keyboard_arrow_down
Anyone can use Cococart from anywhere in the world!
#### **How do I get in touch for custom solutions?**
keyboard_arrow_down
If you have special requirements or want custom solutions with our platform, get in touch with us here.For general inquiries about our product, send us an email here.
## 50,000+ businesses have earned over $50 million
Local businesses, entrepreneurs, restaurants, creators, artisans, and makers around the world have switched to Cococart to grow their sales.
"Such an incredible and easy website for a home business like us. It definitely helps us in getting more sales and make our life 10x easier!"— Mama Spice
"The best online platform for small businesses!"— The Penthouse Kitchen and Bakery
"YES! Instantly fell in love with Cococart! It was so easy to use. I also love how attractive it looks."— Puff 'N Batter
"So fast to edit and so smooth to use. I must say, this is way way better than the other platforms."— Merienda
"I love it! I should've done this sooner."— Paper Burn
"Cococart is EXACTLY what I need for my business. I've been working on my site for 2 years and it's still not published. So thank you for taking this off me."— Jacoby May Photography
"We've switched our ordering platform to Cococart. We're surprised how simple it is to set up, how clean and straightforward the website looks."— Kraft Kind
"I migrated from Shopify. I've been using Cococart for close to a year and it only gets better! My Dad manages his own store on Cococart too!"— Filled 'N Frosted
"Amazing! You make our lives 10000x easier."— Culturd
"Wow! Is it really all this easy? A little too good to be true!"— Valerie's Kitchen

generated_description:
Cococart is a Singapore-based startup that's simplifying the way local businesses sell online. Founded in 2020 and a proud member of Y Combinator's Batch S21, their mission is straightforward: empower local businesses to thrive in the digital marketplace. With over 200 million businesses still taking orders through outdated methods like WhatsApp or phone calls, Cococart offers a modern, no-code solution for setting up an online store—no design skills or app downloads required.

The platform provides an all-in-one experience that includes features like a Point of Sale (POS) system, QR code menus for easy ordering, and marketing tools to help businesses grow their customer base. It’s designed for accessibility, with a user-friendly interface that requires little to no learning curve. Cococart caters to various local businesses, from cafes and restaurants to salons and retail stores, allowing them to manage orders, payments, and promotions seamlessly.

For just **$9 per month**, users can access all these capabilities and more, contrasting sharply with other platforms that can cost upwards of $700 per month. Cococart is particularly appealing to small business owners who want to avoid the high fees and commissions typical of larger marketplaces.

Currently employing a small team of 18, Cococart reflects a growing trend of entrepreneurs shifting toward digital solutions that prioritize their independence and financial sustainability. Over 50,000 businesses have already switched to Cococart, generating more than $50 million in sales. Customer testimonials highlight the platform's ease of use and effectiveness in boosting sales.

For anyone looking to digitize their business or streamline existing online sales channels, Cococart is a compelling option worth exploring. If you're curious to learn more, head over to [cococart.co](https://www.cococart.co).
